top.title: Analysis: Trump issues patriotic rallying cry with eye on crucial elections
top.summary: The BBC's Anthony Zurcher says the US president appealed to his base and taunted his opponents in a marathon speech.

top.title: Ukraine remembers its dead as war enters a fifth year
top.summary: Events were held across Ukraine to mark four years since Russia launched its full-scale invasion.

top.title: Japan to deploy missiles on island near Taiwan by 2031
top.summary: The remote Yonaguni island lies on the frontlines of self-governing Taiwan's growing tensions with China.

top.title: Discord delays age verification plans after user outcry
top.summary: Users were unhappy about plans for age verification to require facial or ID scans.

top.title: US threatens Anthropic with deadline in dispute on AI safeguards
top.summary: The AI developer laid out red lines on military use of its products, a source said.

top.title: Shein's elusive boss hails Chinese roots in rare public appearance
top.summary: His speech follows years of the firm focusing away from China as it moved its headquarters to Singapore.
